snippet: Al Qaeda militants killed 15 soldiers in southern Yemen after seizing them from a public bus on Friday, military officials and witnesses said, in what appeared to be retaliation for an army offensive.
abstract: Al Qaeda militants kill 15 soldiers in southern Yemen after seizing them from a public bus in what appears to be retaliation for army offensive.
lead_paragraph: Al Qaeda militants killed 15 soldiers in southern Yemen after seizing them from a public bus on Friday, military officials and witnesses said, in what appeared to be retaliation for an army offensive.
